last_episode_to_air.name: Can Mother Nature Heal Us?
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tachyon finds people who claim to harness the potential of Mother Nature, ostensibly solving some of the planet's greatest challenges and preparing us for an uncertain future.

name: Mister Tachyon
overview: Mister Tachyon travels the world to explore ideas that exist on the fringe of science.

episodes.name: Do Humans Have a 6th Sense?
episodes.overview: Tachyon wonders if humans possess the ability to develop senses beyond the sight, touch, hearing, taste, and smell. Can technology help us achieve this?

episodes.name: Is Everything in the Universe Connected?
episodes.overview: Can humans be networked? Tachyon learns more about how to enhance our innate capabilities, delving into technology, the animal kingdom, and the intricacies of the human brain.

episodes.name: Can Sound Heal?
episodes.overview: From ancient instruments to modern technologies, Tachyon unpacks the possibility of different sounds to heal the body and mind.

episodes.name: Is Mind Control Real?
episodes.overview: Investigating the power of the human mind, Tachyon discovers if people have the ability to control objects, other people, or ourselves with the power of thoughts alone.

episodes.name: Can Our Minds Cross Time and Space?
episodes.overview: Tachyon searches for answers to the age-old question: do humans have power to connect through time and space and predict the future?

episodes.name: Does Orgone Energy Exist?
episodes.overview: Tachyon explores the concept of orgone energy, a phenomenon that claims can heal the body and change water. He uses orgonite and an orgone accumulator to test these ideas.

episodes.name: Does Ancient Medicine Work?
episodes.overview: With ancient healing practices back on the rise, Tachyon tests the efficacy of plant-based substances and treatments that focus on energy flow.

episodes.name: Can Mother Nature Heal Us?
episodes.overview: Tachyon finds people who claim to harness the potential of Mother Nature, ostensibly solving some of the planet's greatest challenges and preparing us for an uncertain future.
